participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Reserved and somewhat anxious, but also curious about others.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is grey. i am terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar. i'm employed by the us postal service.
